text: 2007–08 Polish Volleyball League was the 72nd season of Polish Championship (8th season as professional league) organized by Professional Volleyball League SA () under the supervision of Polish Volleyball Federation (). Płomień Sosnowiec was promoted to PlusLiga in this season. In season 2007/2008 PGE Skra Bełchatów and Wkręt-met Domex AZS Częstochowa played in CEV Champions League, Mlekpol AZS Olsztyn and Jastrzębski Węgiel played in CEV Cup, Asseco Resovia Rzeszów in CEV Challenge Cup PGE Skra Bełchatów achieved 4th title of Polish Champion. ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2008–09 CEV Champions League |- |width=10px bgcolor=#bbebff| ||Qualified for the 2008–09 CEV Cup |- |width=10px bgcolor=#e6f8ff| ||Qualified for the 2008–09 CEV Challenge Cup |- |width=10px bgcolor=#FFE7E7| ||Play-offs with the 2nd team of 1st league |- |width=10px bgcolor=#FFCCCC| ||Relegation to the 1st league |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=290|Team |- bgcolor=#ccffcc | |align=left|PGE Skra Bełchatów |- bgcolor=#ccffcc | |align=left|Wkręt-met Domex AZS Częstochowa |- bgcolor=#bbebff | |align=left|Mlekpol AZS Olsztyn |- bgcolor=#bbebff |4 |align=left|Jastrzębski Węgiel |- bgcolor=#e6f8ff |5 |align=left|Asseco Resovia Rzeszów |- |6 |align=left|ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle |- |7 |align=left|Płomień Sosnowiec |- |8 |align=left|Jadar Radom |- bgcolor=#FFE7E7 |9 |align=left|J.W.
